Format ae_format48 - 48 bit(s) 11 1110
AE_MOVEA 1001100000 111101
fld_ae_sem_ep_ls_eo 10
fld_ae_sem_ep_ls_ar_s 3210

Assembler Syntax

AE_MOVEA aep0..3(opnd_ae_sem_ep_ls_eo), a0..15(opnd_ae_sem_ep_ls_ar_s)

C Syntax

#include <xtensa/tie/xt_hifi2.h>

extern ae_ep AE_MOVEA(unsigned a);

Description

AE_MOVEA Copy the lowest four bit of AR register a to AE_EP register e.

Implementation Pipeline

In Out
opnd_ae_sem_ep_ls_ar_s Wstage opnd_ae_sem_ep_ls_eo Wstage

Protos that use AE_MOVEA

proto AE_MOVEA { out ae_ep e, in uint32 a }{}{
AE_MOVEA e, a;
}
proto ae_ep_loadi { out ae_ep e, in const ae_ep * a, in immediate imm }{uint8 t}{
L8UI t, a, imm + 0;
AE_MOVEA e, t;
}
